title: Ever since new patch im getting massive fps spikes and ping has bumped up to ~70
body: Hey I'm hoping to get a remedy to this problem ive been having since the new patch dropped. As stated in title fps jumps around from sub 30 to 144 where its capped. Ive tried lowering all settings, turning off all background applications, repairing the patch, checking my conntection and I can't seem to troubleshoot. Reddit removed my post before it could gain any traction, so here I am. I run the game on a 1060 drivers updated this morning. Before patch i was hitting 120 consistently ping was around 50~

replies.body: The way you describe your ping and fps jumping around, it makes me feel like something is trying to interfere with League or maybe those game files aren't working properly after the patch. Let's first make sure the patch worked correctly by running a quick repair, but also be sure to adjust your DNS settings for me really quickly to test that. If you aren't sure how to troubleshoot your DNS settings, check out [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq5).
Hey that seemed to work! Thanks for the tip!

Someone please help me, I am experiencing the same issues. What seemed to fix your issue? I was running 150+ fps before the last two patches and now I'm down to 40-50 at the most... It's unbearable to even attempt to play. All my in game settings are as they were, as they need to be. I've uninstalled and reinstalled and still having the same issues now. HALP
Try updating your drivers, after that try to repair your client, if that doesnt work you can try changing your DNS settings!
